songs.title: Clouds (2009 Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh, woah! Oh, wo-a-oh!
Oh, woah! Oh, wo-a-oh!

[Verse 1]
My calloused hands
My crippled wings
My calloused hands, my crippled wings, they bring you in

[Pre-Chorus]
I've been taught if I would just open my hands up to the sky
They'll turn to clouds, woah
A sky of hands that rains down heavy on us

[Chorus]
Oh, just forget it, just forget it, oh, close your eyes
I never said it, never said it, oh surprise
Come on let it, let it move, let it move, move
Let it, let it, let it move, let it move
Oh, just forget it, just forget it, oh, close your eyes
I never said it, never said it, oh surprise
Come on let it, let it move, let it move, move
Speak, speak, speak, speak to me
Let it go

[Verse 2]
Your scribbled masterpiece
And written poetry

[Pre-Chorus]
But I've been taught if I would just open my hands up to the sky
They'll turn to clouds, woah
A sky of hands that rains down heavy on us

[Chorus]
Oh, just forget it, just forget it, oh, close your eyes
I never said it, never said it, oh surprise
Come on let it, let it move, let it move, move
Let it, let it, let it move, let it move
Oh, just forget it, just forget it, oh, close your eyes
I never said it, never said it, oh surprise
Come on let it, let it move, let it move, move
Speak, speak, speak, speak to me
Let it go

[Bridge]
Come out I'm waiting on your front porch
You came in from the back door
Drift along a flooded
Sea of muddy waters
Clouds above us crying
Tears of sins all dying
Begging for a reason
Oh, woah! Oh, wo-a-oh!
Oh, woah! Oh, wo-a-oh! Oh, no
Oh, come out I'm waiting on your front porch
You came in from the back door
Drift along a flooded
Sea of muddy waters
Clouds above us crying
Tears of sins all dying
Begging for a reason
Year seems like a season
Belief in how we're living
A story with no ending
The storm is beating down

[Outro]
We're sinking to the sky
Sinking to the sky
We're sinking to the sky
Sinking to the sky
Ah!
